participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is a dedicated and hardworking individual who loves sports and enjoys spending time with his family.
participant_1.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i enjoy american sports. i am a male. i have children and dogs.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is a relaxed and cheerful person who appreciates the little joys in life, such as bubble baths and the company of her dogs.
participant_2.background: i love taking bubble baths. i'm single and with two dogs. i do not drink alcohol. i'm in my thirties.

content.text: Hey! Do you enjoy American sports?
